Package org.atlanmod.commons.service

Provides classes and methods to ease services discovery with ServiceLoader and OSGi.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServiceContext
    A context able to retrieve registered services.
    ServiceDefinition<T>
    Represents a service definition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OSGiContext
    A ServiceContext able to retrieve OSGi Declarative Services from a BundleContext.
    ServiceLoaderContext
    A ServiceContext able to retrieve registered services from a ServiceLoader.
    ServiceProvider
    An object able to retrieve and load services according to a ServiceContext.

Package org.atlanmod.commons.service Description

Provides classes and methods to ease services discovery with ServiceLoader and OSGi.
